name: SCP-087: The Stairwell
description:
Based off of the story of SCP-087 (Found Here: http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-087 ). I do not take credit for the original design of the story, only the assets and production within the game.

You are a Class-D Subject; a death row inmate given a second chance. All you have to do is follow the orders of these scientists for a month and you're free! Sounds simple enough and it beats being behind bars for the rest of your life, so why not give it a shot.

You're being sent into a college campus where there's a report of some weird dark staircase. Makes you wonder what these people are doing if they're just scared of the dark. Might as well get the job done and earn your freedom.


Controls can be found in the Main Menu. There is a feature list within the files if you would like a full set of features of the game, but it is recomended that you play the game at least one time before reading through. If you know the story of the SCP games, then you can ignore this suggestion.

If you would like to see the process in which i built this game, check out my small video series here:
